import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Button, Form } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import NavBar from "../NavBar/NavBar"; class Attendance extends React.Component { state = { fname: "", lname: "", year: "", type: "", lec: "", image1: "", image2: "", image3: "", branch: "", }; postAttendance = () => { const data = { fname: this.state.fname, lname: this.state.lname, year: this.state.year, type: this.state.type, lec: this.state.lec, image1: this.state.image1, image2: this.state.image2, image3: this.state.image3, branch: this.state.branch, }; axios .post("http://127.0.0.1:5000/attendance", data) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }; render() { return (
this.setState({ fname: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ lname: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ image1: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ image2: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ image3: e.target.value })} />
); } } export default Attendance;
